content.text:
[@alanz](@ZcjYF92reFjUtEYdoJ8ulOI6N6klwAAaIkghEEHdvSE=.ed25519) 

Looks like I had another fun bug where I was using the day of week as a date, so it was pulling info for July 4th. Fixed *that*, too. Someday I'll test my toy software before publishing it to the world. Maybe. :wink: 


[@LanceW](@W87GwaaxNj0PSBbtc5qUm/A/xOO8AWPdNtJn6hzR8s0=.ed25519) 

It's currently a total mess, but you can see the source here: https://gitlab.com/christianbundy/ssb-current-events
